DOC.brief_summary: Specific Aims : 1 ) Measure exhalation enthalpy patient receive conventional positive pressure ventilation stable hemodynamic condition . 2 ) Measure exhalation enthalpy patient follow change two-lung ventilation one-lung ventilation minute ventilation remain constant .
